channel.title: Quoted on Liam Getreu
channel.description: Recent content in Quoted on Liam Getreu

item.title: Quoted: Australian Government Adopts IHRA Definition
item.description: I was quoted in a Guardian Australia article on the Australian government’s adoption of the International Holocaust Remembrance Alliance (IHRA) working definition of antisemitism.

item.title: Quoted: Ben & Jerry's
item.description: I was quoted in an Australian Jewish News article today about Ben & Jerry’s announcement it would no longer sell its ice cream in Israeli settlements in the West Bank:

item.title: Quoted: New Israeli Government Without Netanyahu
item.description: I was quoted in the Australian Jewish News as Benjamin Netanyahu was replaced as prime minister by Naftali Bennett.

item.title: Quoted: Escalation in Gaza
item.description: I was quoted in a Guardian Australia article today about the ongoing escalation of violence in Gaza:

item.title: Quoted: Abraham Accords
item.description: I was quoted in an Australian Jewish News article today about the Abraham Accords:

item.title: Quoted: Annexation
item.description: I was quoted in an Australian Jewish News article today about Israel’s plans to annex parts of the West Bank:

item.title: Quoted: Escalation in Israel & Gaza
item.description: I was quoted in the Australian Jewish News about the recent escalation in violence in Israel & Gaza:

item.title: Quoted: Netanyahu Embraces Kahanism
item.description: I was quoted in the Australian Jewish News on Prime Minister Netanyahu’s embrace of a racist anti-Arab party of neo-Kahanists.

item.title: On the Australian government’s decision to recognise West Jerusalem
item.description: I was interviewed for AM in gauging reactions from the Jewish and Palestinian communities on the Australian government’s announcement regarding West Jerusalem.

item.title: Interviewed on 7.30 in segment on Israel's crackdown on human rights organisations
item.description: I was interviewed on 7.30 as part of a report on the Israeli government’s proposed new laws aimed at curtailing the activities of human rights organisations.
